# ssh config

  • ssh config
    • 配置文件路径
    • 配置实例

# 配置文件路径

～/.ssh/config

# 配置实例

Host alias                      # Host alias  ssh别名
    HostName xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx

    Port 22

    User root

    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa  # IdentityFile  证书路径
